scripts.build: octopus player/index.8o bin/bad-apple.8o && cat bin/bad-apple.8o | pbcopy
scripts.build-all: npm run build && npm run build-binary && npm run build-html
scripts.build-binary: npm run build && octo bin/bad-apple.8o bin/bad-apple.ch8
scripts.build-html: npm run build && octo --options octo-config.json bin/bad-apple.8o docs/octo/index.html
